# numpy N dimensional array

```python
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.array([0, 1])
w = np.array([0.5, 0.5])
b = -0.7

w * x
```

```python
np.sum(w * x)
np.sum(w * x) + b
```
